overview: Mr. Hartman is Chief Financial Officer of Simplex Healthcare, Inc. and brings 15 years of corporate finance experience from leading large cap healthcare companies. Prior to joining Simplex, Mr. Hartman served as Director of Finance at Psychiatric Solutions (PSYS) as well as Vice President of Investor Relations at Caremark (formerly CMX), where he played an integral role in the CVS-Caremark merger. Prior to that, over the course of 11 years, Mr. Hartman held multiple leadership roles at Eli Lilly and Company (LLY) in corporate finance within the Treasury, Global R&D and Investor Relations components. Mr. Hartman holds a B.A. in Economics from DePauw University and an M.B.A. from the University of Notre Dame.
